title: Blame has no place in weightloss
itunes:title: Blame has no place in weightloss
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Blame has no place in weightloss. In this episode I talk about how blame allows you to focus your attention on things that get you NOWHERE fast on the scale. When you take responsibility for how you show up with your food choices you are now in the driver's seat.
